title: Surf4cars is Awarded the Dealer of the Year
text: Surf4cars is Awarded the Dealer of the Year South Africa, 12 October 2015 -- Offers good quality used cars of various makes, models and variants at competitive prices. Browse website or call +27(086)1434649 to take a test drive today.The Glen Inspecta Car awarded Surf4cars the “Dealer of the Year” award for their outstanding car dealership services. Recently, Surf4cars has launched a new scheme of “Buy Now and Pay in February.”Under this scheme, buyers get the opportunity to buy a car with 30% balloon payment and start paying the installments from February 2016. This offer is available only on selected cars. Surf4cars is a branded name in the field of car solutions. They pawn, buy, sell, and hire cars. By following the simple philosophy of creating a friendly atmosphere, the company has been able to successfully create a space where used car buyers and sellers can easily connect. In this fast-moving digital age, no one prefers to spend time on hunting for used cars. The online showroom of Surf4cars gives you the freedom to quickly find your favourite car. Just at the click of your mouse, you can see listings of thousands of branded cars. The unique search portal provided by the organisation help you to find your dream car. You can find any specific model and body style on their website. You will find many used vehicles on the Surf4cars website. If you are a used car dealer and you have second hand Mazda bakkies or hatch backs for sale, you can easily find buyers for them. Surf4cars sells used cars, brand new cars, as well as commercial cars. There are more than 22,000 cars for sale on the website. To know more about buying used cars and exciting offers, log on to http://www.surf4cars.co.za . About Surf4cars Surf4cars is an all-in-one car solution provider based in South Africa. They buy and sell both used and brand new cars, and provide car insurance and car hiring services. Their authenticity is their recognition. There are many similar companies that promise to provide the best service and a vast range of second hand cars. The difference between Surf4cars and other such services is that Surf4cars indeed delivers as promised without any hassles. Purchasing a dream car is indeed a big decision. Surf4cars makes it an exciting and enjoyable experience for their clients. To encourage their clients and dealers, the company has launched exciting competitions too. Contact:
